items.title: US destroys alleged Venezuelan drug boat, killing three
items.description: The attack came after the Venezuelan president said Caracas would defend itself against US "aggression".

items.title: Charlie Kirk suspect linked to crime scene by DNA, says FBI chief
items.description: Kash Patel says Tyler Robinson's DNA was found on towel wrapping suspected murder weapon.

items.title: US says 'framework' for TikTok ownership deal agreed with China
items.description: The deal will pave the way to US ownership of the social media platform' s American operations, according to the US treasury secretary.

items.title: Does Israel face a 'South Africa moment' over Gaza?
items.description: BBC diplomatic correspondent Paul Adams looks at parallels between reactions to Israel and apartheid-era South Africa.
